actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

actions.committee: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship
actions.text: Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship. Hearings held.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to ensure small businesses affected by the onset of transmissible diseases are eligible for disaster relief.
short_title: Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2016

summary.text:
Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2016

This bill amends the Small Business Act with respect to Small Business Administration disaster assistance to expand the definition of "disaster" to include the onset of transmissible diseases for which the federal government issues a public health advisory or declaration.

titles.title: Small Business Relief from Disease Induced Economic Hardship Act of 2016
A bill to amend the Small Business Act to ensure small businesses affected by the onset of transmissible diseases are eligible for disaster relief.
